alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 8:08PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Geauga, Cuyahoga and Lake Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 806 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow boundary with gusty winds along a line extending from 28 miles north of Fairport Harbor to 14 miles northwest of Lakeline to near Westlake. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong winds will precede showers and thunderstorms over Lake Erie. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Painesville, Willowick, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Parma, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, North Royalton, Solon, Willoughby, Eastlake, Warrensville Heights, South Russell, Madison, Middlefield, Perry and Burton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
